contentrichtext.text: {{primarysources|date=January 2013}} :''For other uses, see '''[[Sporting Life (disambiguation)|Sporting Life]]''''' '''Sporting Life''' is a sporting goods [[retailer]] based in [[Toronto, Ontario]]. Founded in 1979, it is a privately owned by Fairfax Financial Holdings Limited, [[Patti Russell]], [[David Russell (Canadian business)|David Russell]], and [[Brian McGrath (Canadian business)|Brian McGrath]]. Fairfax bought a 75% share in the company in late 2011 with the founders retaining the remaining balance of shares. The clothing and equipment lines are catered towards [[wilderness chic]], [[climbing|climbers]], [[mountaineering|mountaineers]], [[skiing|skiers]], [[snowboarding|snowboarders]], and [[hiking|hikers]]. Sporting Life sells footwear, children's apparel, women's, men's and equipment for sports including, [[running]], and [[cycling]]. It has a large selection of [[outerwear]], [[Polar fleece|fleece]], and coats from brands such as [[The North Face]] and [[Canada Goose (clothing)|Canada Goose]]. Sporting Life also carries casual clothing brands, the most popular of which include [[Juicy Couture]], [[Prada]], [[Michael Kors]], [[Roxy (clothing)|Roxy]], [[Adidas by Stella McCartney]], [[Nike, Inc.|Nike]], [[Hugo Boss]], and [[Lacoste]]. The store is popular during [[Boxing Day]], as brands such as North Face are often marked down 50%, though these promotions do not extend to Canada Goose.[http://www.shopsportinglife.ca/images4/apparel.jpg] Sporting Life has four locations. Of those, the only store located outside of Toronto is in [[Collingwood, Ontario]], situated near [[Blue Mountain (ski resort)|Blue Mountain]]. A fifth store is set to open at [[Ottawa]]'s [[Lansdowne Park]] in 2014. On June 25,2013, Sporting Life bought Tommy & Lefebvre a Ottawa-based sporting retailer. The staff at Tommy & Lefebvre Bank street location will move to Sporting Life's new store at [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lansdowne_Park Lansdowne Park]. ==External links== *[http://sportinglife.ca Sporting Life Homepage] *[http://www.fairfax.ca/news/press-releases/press-release-details/2011/Fairfax-Announces-Acquisition-of-Sporting-Life1127762/default.aspx} [[Category:Sporting goods retailers of Canada]] [[Category:Companies based in Toronto]]
